name: Train Clicker v1.2.1
description:
-Train Clicker-

The game where you upgrade and click a train.

Welcome to Train Clicker.

In this game, you will upgrade and click a train.

You can save at any time along the way.

When you reach certain milestones, you will get charms.

There is also 4 upgrades.

Have fun!

Website: https://train-clicker-v-1-2-1-ad-01.webnode.page/
